an3.36:5.4: Taṃ kho pana te etaṃ → taṃ kho panetaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), pāpakammaṃ → pāpaṃ kammaṃ (bj)
an3.36:15.4: () → (so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccati) (bj) | (so tattha phenuddehakaṃ paccati) (s1-3)
an3.36:22.1: appamattā → te khoppattā (bj) | te khemappattā (s1-3, km, pts1), sukhino → sukhitā (bj, s1-3, pts1)
